item.title: The Danger of Wealth
item.description:
series: Acting in grace together #

verse: James 5:1-6 #

Main Idea: #

Your riches will spoil and your coins will corrode. You kept your own pockets fat at the expense of those that work for you.

Who is James condemning? #

James is addressing to a particular group of people: Christians. He’s talking about a majority of people in the church. The issue is the abuse of wealth. Hoarding it instead of using it for the glory of God. Hoarding is different than saving. Saving is encouraged by the Bible. It makes good stewards. Hoarding is accumulating so much wealth, more than necessary. Are you trying to accumulate wealth so that you can have control over your life? Trust in God, not in wealth.
